name: Dominik Schwind
text:
Mentioned by https://dominikschwind.com/link/on-social-media-lurkers-introverts-and-blogging

> Absolutely. I do miss the short time when people just used the things we now call social media for fun but maybe it is okay the way it is right now.

content.html: Absolutely. I do miss the short time when people just used the things we now call social media for fun but maybe it is okay the way it is right now.
content.text: Absolutely. I do miss the short time when people just used the things we now call social media for fun but maybe it is okay the way it is right now.
